Jx.Plugin.Form.Validator

Extends: Jx.Plugin

Form plugin for enforcing validation on the fields in a form.

License

Copyright © 2009, Jonathan Bomgardner.  Parts inspired by mootools-more’s Form.Validator class

This file is licensed under an MIT style license

Summary
Jx.Plugin.Form.ValidatorExtends: Jx.Plugin
Options
fields
fieldDefaults{Object} contains named defaults for field validators to be triggered on blur or change.
validateOnSubmit{Boolean} default true.
suspendSubmit{Boolean} default false.
Functions
initconstruct a new instance of the plugin.
attachSets up the plugin and connects it to the form
onFieldAddedEvent handler for the form’s fieldAdded event.
detach
isValidCall this to determine whether the form validates.
getErrorsUse this method to get all of the errors from all of the fields.

Options

fields

This will be key/value pairs for each of the fields as shown here

{
    fieldID: {
         ... options for Field.Validator plugin ...
    },
    fieldID: {...
    }
}

fieldDefaults

{Object} contains named defaults for field validators to be triggered on blur or change.  Default is:

{
   validateOnBlur: true
   validateOnChange: false
}

validateOnSubmit

{Boolean} default true.  Trigger validation on submission of form if true.

suspendSubmit

{Boolean} default false.  Stop form submission when validator is attached.

Functions

init

init: function()

construct a new instance of the plugin.  The plugin must be attached to a Jx.Grid instance to be useful though.

attach

attach: function (form)

Sets up the plugin and connects it to the form

onFieldAdded

onFieldAdded: function(field,
form)

Event handler for the form’s fieldAdded event.  Handles attaching Field.Validator instances to the field as they are added if needed.

detach

detach: function()

isValid

isValid: function ()

Call this to determine whether the form validates.

getErrors

getErrors: function ()

Use this method to get all of the errors from all of the fields.
